d:testDescription.p: This test checks two properties from the SVGElementInstance interface, correspondingElement and correspondingUseElement

d:operatorScript.p: Click the grey rectangle on the right side.

d:passCriteria.p: For the test to pass, both lines starting with "Test for" must turn to green when the grey rectangle on the right side is clicked, and the grey rectangle must also turn green.

g.text: Click on the grey rectangle to start
